tit.cmt: タイトルのため、頭文字を大文字にしました。

sen.j: 加茂街道（かもかいどう）は京都市内の通りの一つで賀茂川右岸（西岸）堤防上を走る。
sen.e: Kamo kaido is one of the street which runs on the embankment on left shore of (west shore) Kamo River in Kyoto City.
Kamo kaido is a street running the embankment of the left shore of (west shore) Kamo River in Kyoto City.
Kamo kaido is a street running the embankment of the left shore of (west shore) the Kamo-gawa River in Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: Kamo-gawa Riverとしました。"Kamo-gawa"→"the Kamo-gawa"に変更しました。

sen.j: 北は、御薗橋、志久呂橋を越え、高橋付近で雲ヶ畑に至る道と合する。
sen.e: The north goes through Misono Bridge and Shikuro Bridge and connects to the street which runs to Kumogahata at Takahashi.
In the north, the street goes through Misono Bridge and Shikuro Bridge and connects to a street which runs to Kumogahata at Takahashi.
In the north, the street goes through Misono-bashi Bridge and Shikuro-bashi Bridge and connects to a street which runs to Kumogahata at Takahashi.
sen.cmt: Misono-bashi Bridge, Shikuro-bashi Bridgeとしました。

sen.j: 南は葵橋西詰で下鴨本通と合し、河原町通として南進する。
sen.e: The south connects to Shimogamohon-dori Street at Aoi Bridge nishi dume, and runs to south as Kawaramachi-dori Street.
In the south, it connects to Shimogamohon-dori Street at Aoi Bridge nishi dume, and runs south as Kawaramachi-dori Street.
In the south, it connects to Shimogamohon-dori Street at the west end of Aoi-bashi Bridge, and runs south as Kawaramachi-dori Street.
sen.cmt: 葵橋西詰の表記を修正

sen.j: 下鴨神社と上賀茂神社の祭礼である葵祭（5月15日に行われる巡行である路頭の儀）の経路の一部（北大路加茂街道から御薗橋西詰の間）となっている。
sen.e: It is one of a route (between Kitaoji-kamo Gaido and Misono Bridge nishi dume) for Aoi Festival (a ceremony of Roto is a visiting tour which is held on April 15) which is the festival of Simogamo Jinja Shrine and Kamigamo Jinja Shrine.

It is one route (between Kitaoji-kamo Gaido and Misono Bridge nishi dume) taken during the Aoi Festival (a visiting tour known as the ceremony of Roto which is held on April 15) which is a festival held by Simogamo Jinja Shrine and Kamigamo Jinja Shrine.

It is one route (between Kitaoji Kamo kaido and the west end of Misono-bashi Bridge) taken during the Aoi Festival (a visiting tour known as the ceremony of Roto which is held on May 15) which is a festival held by Simogamo-jinja Shrine and Kamigamo-jinja Shrine.
sen.cmt: 北大路加茂街道、御薗橋西詰の表記を修正、April→Mayに修正、Simogamo-jinja Shrine, Kamigamo-jinja Shrineとしました。

sen.j: 御薗橋から南の区間は高木の緑のトンネルの区間が多く、緑の中、色鮮やかな行列が通る様は見事である。
sen.e: There are many tall tree tunnels at the section from Misono Bridge to the south, it is beautiful to see bright parade in the green.
The many tall tree tunnels in the section from Misono Bridge to the south form a beautiful bright green parade.
The many tall tree tunnels in the section from Misono-bashi Bridge to the south form a beautiful bright green parade.

sen.j: 上側が北側、下側が南側。
sen.e: The upper side is north side, the lower side is south side.
The upper side is considered the northern portion, while the lower side is considered the southern portion.
The upper side is considered the northern portion, while the lower side is considered the southern portion.

sen.j: 左側が西側、右側が東側。
sen.e: The left side is west side, the right side is east side.
The left side is considered the western portion, while the right side is considered the east portion.
The left side is considered the western portion, while the right side is considered the east portion.

sen.j: 交差する道路の特記がないものは市町村道。
sen.e: The crossing road without special mention is municipality's road.
Intersections that are not labeled are munincipal roads.
Intersections that are not labeled are munincipal roads.
Main facilities on the street
Main facilities on the street
Main Facilities on the Street
sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 賀茂別雷神社〔上賀茂神社〕御薗橋
sen.e: Kamo Wakeikazuchi Jinja Shrine (Kamigamo Jinja Shrine) Misono Bridge
Kamo Wakeikazuchi Jinja Shrine (Kamigamo Jinja Shrine) Misono Bridge
Kamo Wakeikazuchi-jinja Shrine (Kamigamo-jinja Shrine) Misono-bashi Bridge

sen.j: 京都市立加茂川中学校 堀川通
sen.e: Kyoto City Kamogawa Junior High School: Horikawa-dori Street
Kyoto City Kamogawa Junior High School: Horikawa-dori Street
Kyoto City Kamogawa Junior High School: Horikawa-dori Street

sen.j: 京都府立植物園 北山大橋または北大路橋
sen.e: The Kyoto Botanical Garden: Kitayamaohashi Bridge or Kitaoji Bridge
The Kyoto Botanical Garden: Kitayamaohashi Bridge or Kitaoji Bridge
The Kyoto Botanical Garden: Kitayama Ohashi Bridge or Kitaoji-bashi Bridge
sen.cmt: Kitayama Ohashi Bridge, Kitaoji-bashi Bridgeとしました。

sen.e: Public transportation
Public transportation
Public Transportation
sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更, 字の大きさを他と統一

sen.j: 京都市営バスと京都バスの路線がある。
sen.e: There are lines for Kyoto City Bus and Kyoto Bus.
Kyoto City Bus and Kyoto Bus lines are available.
Kyoto City Bus and Kyoto Bus lines are available.
